## LiquityStoreDerivedState.redemptionFeeFactor property

Current redemption fee factor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redemptionFeeFactor: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

Note that the actual redemption fee will depend on the amount of LUSD being redeemed.

Use [Fees.redemptionFeeFactor()](./lib-base.fees.redemptionfeefactor.md) to calculate a precise redemption fee factor.
